prompts: Create a purple and teal Pokemon that has large wings and a sleek body.
Generate an image of a bat-like creature with a vibrant color scheme and sharp features.
Design a creature with a unique flying ability, featuring a blend of blue and purple hues.
Show me a Pokemon that thrives in urban areas and has a stealthy demeanor.
Imagine a Pokemon known for its speed and agility, adorned with striking wing patterns.
Make a Pokemon that is elusive and prefers to inhabit caves and forests.
Give me a depiction of a dual-type Pokemon that exudes a sense of mystery and grace.
